snippet: The Giants have faced a tougher strength of schedule throughout the 2011 season. That's the difference that makes them a very slight favorite.
abstract: The Giants have faced a tougher strength of schedule throughout the 2011 season. That's the difference that makes them a very slight favorite.
lead_paragraph: Last year's Super Bowl was such a close matchup that I had to go to the thousandths decimal place to determine the statistical favorite. It's not that I believe that level of precision is possible, but I knew many readers would consider it a cop-out if I left the game at 50/50. This year we're almost as fortunate, and we can expect another close and hopefully exciting game.

headline.main: Super Bowl Probability: Giants, Just Barely
